name: URLSessionTask
desc: A task, like downloading a specific resource, performed in a URL session.

items.name: cancel
items.desc: Cancels the task.

items.name: resume
items.desc: Resumes the task, if it is suspended.

items.name: suspend
items.desc: Temporarily suspends a task.

items.name: state
items.desc: The current state of the task—active, suspended, in the process of being canceled, or completed.

items.name: URLSessionTask.State
items.desc: Constants for determining the current state of a task.

items.name: priority
items.desc: The relative priority at which you’d like a host to handle the task, specified as a floating point value between 0.0 (lowest priority) and 1.0 (highest priority).

items.name: progress
items.desc: A representation of the overall task progress.

items.name: countOfBytesExpectedToReceive
items.desc: The number of bytes that the task expects to receive in the response body.

items.name: countOfBytesReceived
items.desc: The number of bytes that the task has received from the server in the response body.

items.name: countOfBytesExpectedToSend
items.desc: The number of bytes that the task expects to send in the request body.

items.name: countOfBytesSent
items.desc: The number of bytes that the task has sent to the server in the request body.

items.name: NSURLSessionTransferSizeUnknown
items.desc: The total size of the transfer cannot be determined.

items.name: currentRequest
items.desc: The URL request object currently being handled by the task.

items.name: originalRequest
items.desc: The original request object passed when the task was created.

items.name: response
items.desc: The server’s response to the currently active request.

items.name: taskDescription
items.desc: An app-provided string value for the current task.

items.name: taskIdentifier
items.desc: An identifier uniquely identifying the task within a given session.

items.name: error
items.desc: An error object that indicates why the task failed.

items.name: countOfBytesClientExpectsToReceive
items.desc: A best-guess upper bound on the number of bytes the client expects to receive.

items.name: countOfBytesClientExpectsToSend
items.desc: A best-guess upper bound on the number of bytes the client expects to send.

items.name: NSURLSessionTransferSizeUnknown
items.desc: The total size of the transfer cannot be determined.

items.name: earliestBeginDate
items.desc: The earliest date at which the network load should begin.
